ticket.title: net/smtp enable_tls method support for ActionMailer / mail gem
ticket.original-body:
Hi! I think the mail library (which is used by ActionMailer) this library should handle the enable_tls method of the underlying net/stmp library. This is required for some servers which don't fallback or don't allow plain SMTP connection.
I already forked this repository, wrote a patch and requested a pull. You can see it here:
https://github.com/ShogunPanda/mail/commit/8416cc81cd6a03f3bc9a863ee04cc5fdfec8bcc2
Hope this helps. Best regards, Shogun
